    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com es fa un diagrama de formatgets?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you draw a pie chart?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie zeichnen Sie ein Kreisdiagramm?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment tracez-vous un diagramme circulaire 
circulaire ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você desenha uma carta de torta?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come tracciate un diagramma a torta?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς σύρετε ένα διάγραμμα πιτών;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre com es fa un diagrama de sectors. Conté una activitat interactiva amb la calculadora de l'edu365.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on how to draw a pie chart. It includes an interactive exercise using the edu365 on-screen calculator.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
            <string language="es">estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, wie man ein
Kreisdiagramm zeichnet. Es schließt eine interaktive Übung mit
dem Aufbildschirm edu365 Rechner ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la façon dont tracer 
un diagramme circulaire circulaire. Il inclut un exercice 
interactif à l'aide de la calculatrice du sur-écran edu365.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em como desenhar uma carta de 
torta. Inclui um exercício interativo usando a calculadora da 
em-tela edu365.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su come tracciare un diagramma 
a torta. Include un'esercitazione interattiva per mezzo del 
calcolatore dello su-schermo edu365.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο πώς να σύρει ένα 
διάγραμμα πιτών. Περιλαμβάνει μια διαλογική άσκηση 
χρησιμοποιώντας τον επί της οθόνης υπολογιστή edu365.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mathématiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
